home.resumo-sobre: The Construindo o Futuro is an organization of teenagers who develop social and environmental projects to solve the problems of their communities.
home.resumo-projetos: We develop projects based on the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. Get to know the initiatives implemented by our volunteers!
home.resumo-visão: Engage young leaders from different communities in Brazil and around the world to become true agents of change where they live and, thus, conquer opportunities and places of speech.
home.resumo-missão: Promote sustainable development in schools and communities by empowering local youth to be true agents of change.
home.resumo-embaixadas: CF embassies are groups of young people who come together to work together towards sustainable development and the UN SDGs in their schools, universities, communities, cities and regions. The CF embassies are formed by:
